title: Roadside Assistance (CRS082)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Shon Kennedy first shared on the podcast in June of 2013 about an encounter on the road.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Shon Kennedy, Kevin Allison)
